revised_title: Gideon Mantell and the Discovery of the Maidstone Iguanodon
tldr: This article tells the story of Gideon Mantell's discovery of the Iguanodon, a dinosaur species, in a quarry near Maidstone, England. Mantell, with the help of quarry owner W.H. Bensted, identified the fossil bones as belonging to the Iguanodon species, which was named after the location of the discovery. The article also discusses the geological context of the find and the importance of the discovery for the field of paleontology.
